name: Local Development Configuration
description: Enhanced local development settings for Riddle Rush

dev:mobile.description: Development for mobile testing (accessible on network)

dev:https.description: Development with HTTPS for PWA testing

dev:mobile-https.description: Development with HTTPS and network access

generate:debug.description: Generate static site with debug information

commonIssues.portInUse: Port 3000 is already in use. Try: lsof -i :3000 (Mac/Linux) or netstat -ano | findstr :3000 (Windows)
commonIssues.buildFailed: Try: rm -rf .nuxt .output && pnpm install && pnpm dev

steps: Connect device to same WiFi as computer
On device, open Safari and go to: http://[your-computer-ip]:3000
Add to Home Screen for PWA testing
Connect device to same WiFi as computer
On device, open Chrome and go to: http://[your-computer-ip]:3000
Use 'Add to Home screen' for PWA testing
Run: pnpm dev:https (HTTPS required for Service Worker)
Open Chrome DevTools > Application > Service Workers
Check that service worker is registered and activated
Test offline functionality by checking 'Offline' checkbox
Open Chrome and navigate to https://localhost:3000
Look for install prompt or use Chrome menu > Install
Check that app launches from desktop/home screen

vueDevtools.installation: Install Vue DevTools extension for Chrome/Firefox

tips: Use pnpm dev:debug for detailed logging
For mobile testing, use your local IP address
Test PWA features with HTTPS enabled
Use Chrome's Device Toolbar for responsive testing
